string-array.name: faqs4
string-array.item: How is HPV transmitted (how does it spread)?
How can HPV transmission be decreased or prevented?
If HPV is transmitted during sex, should women stop having sex?
If men are not treated for HPV and have sex with women, will they get HPV?
Does male circumcision decrease risk of HPV transmission?
If a woman has HPV and is pregnant, will her child be born with HPV?
